hero.title: Portable AI Agent Runtime for Adaptive & Emergent Intelligence
hero.subtitle: Build adaptive, emergent AI agents with memory, tools, and agency. TypeScript runtime featuring GMI roles, multi-agent orchestration, and enterprise guardrails.

technicalHighlights.title: Streaming-first runtime
technicalHighlights.detail: Token-level delivery across personas, guardrails, and channels.

technicalHighlights.title: Deterministic orchestration
technicalHighlights.detail: Parallel GMIs with auditable routing, approvals, and budgets.

technicalHighlights.title: Zero-copy memory fabric
technicalHighlights.detail: Vector, episodic, and working memory stitched together for recall.

technicalHighlights.title: Portable intelligence capsules
technicalHighlights.detail: Export full AgentOS instances as Markdown or JSON and ingest anywhere.

features.sectionSubtitle: Production-grade infrastructure for building, deploying, and scaling AI agents

multiAgent.title: Emergent Multi-Agent Coordination
multiAgent.description: Spawn researcher, analyst, critic, and executor personas from a single goal. Shared context, budgets, and approvals keep every branch in sync.

toolPacks.title: Tool & Guardrail Packs
toolPacks.description: Ship opinionated extensions for search, vision, code execution, or custom APIs with built-in permissions and retries.

language.title: Language & Translation
language.description: Auto-detect locale and tone per surface. Personas stay fluent across voice, chat, and docs with translation providers of your choice.

storage.title: Storage & Deployment
storage.description: Switch between PostgreSQL, better-sqlite3, sql.js, or your own data layers. Every agent step is synced and replayable.

workbench.title: Local-First Workbench
workbench.description: Prototype entire agencies in-browser with persisted SQL, timeline scrubbers, and a built-in marketplace of personas.
workbench.bullet2: Sync artifacts back to the cloud
workbench.bullet3: Export full agencies as Markdown/JSON bundles

guardrails.title: Guardrails & Safety
guardrails.description: Built-in content moderation, PII detection, and compliance checks. Circuit breakers, cost guards, and stuck detection prevent runaway loops and excessive spending.
guardrails.bullet1: Circuit breaker + cost guard + stuck detection

streaming.title: Streaming Runtime
streaming.description: Token-level streaming with real-time output. Built for low-latency interactions with support for SSE, WebSockets, and custom transports.

workflow.title: Workflow Engine
workflow.description: Define complex multi-step workflows with conditional branching, parallel execution, and automatic retry logic.

marketplace.description: Share, buy, and sell your AgentOS agencies. We'll handle CI/CD, infrastructure, payouts, and compliance so you can focus on adaptive, emergent, permanent intelligence.

caseStudies.description: Real-world AgentOS implementations and production deployments

gmiSection.title: Parallel Agency
gmiSection.subtitle: Build sophisticated AI systems with adaptive personas and emergent, dynamic behaviors. Route inbound support tickets to the right persona, push CRM updates safely, and keep every RAG workflow inside deterministic guardrails. AgentOS GMIs enable autonomous agents that learn, adapt, and evolveâ€”then export those insights as portable intelligence bundles.
whatYouGetItems: Persona library for research, analysis, creation, critique, execution, and future GMIs.
Deterministic orchestration with guardrails, budgets, approvals, and SOC2/GDPR-ready event trails.
Unified memory fabric (working, episodic, vector) plus portable exports for Markdown/JSON ingestion.

snapshots.outcome: Researcher gathers context, Analyst verifies facts, and Executor pushes the outcome into Salesforce or Linear automatically.
Orchestrator enforces guardrails, memory logs every decision, and Event Stream keeps auditors in the loop for SOC2/GDPR.
Creator + Executor personas adapt content by locale while Gateway throttles workloads and exports full runs as Markdown/JSON.

ui.outcome: Every interface streams into the same shared AgentOS memory and policy store.

whatIsAgentOS.question: What is AgentOS?
whatIsAgentOS.answer: AgentOS is a modular platform for building adaptive, policyâ€‘aware agents with tooling, memory, and multiâ€‘agent collaboration.

customPersonas.answer: Yes. Define personas, agencies, and workflows with evolution rules, guardrails, and extensions.

hero.title: About AgentOS
hero.description: AgentOS is an openâ€‘source TypeScript runtime for building adaptive, emergent AI agent systems. Built by {link}, AgentOS powers intelligent applications with GMI orchestration, persistent memory, and enterpriseâ€‘grade guardrails.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: Weâ€™re building the most advanced AI agent runtime for developers who want to create intelligent, adaptive systems without compromising on control, safety, or performance.
mission.p2: AgentOS combines cutting-edge AI orchestration with production-ready infrastructure, enabling developers to build everything from simple chatbots to complex multi-agent systems with {span} memory architecture.

team.title: The Team
team.description: AgentOS is developed by the team at {link}, a company focused on building the future of AIâ€‘powered development tools. We're a distributed team of engineers, designers, and AI researchers passionate about making advanced AI accessible to all developers.
